faq.title: Have any Question?
faq.subtitle: Here are some frequently asked questions by our users.

allFaq.title: Is the contact form dynamic?
allFaq.description: Yes, We used nodemailer to dynamic the contact form. So you just need to configure the SMTP and add your email to recive submitted email in your email address.

allFaq.title: How to deploy the the template?
allFaq.description: The process of deployment is very easy. We have proper instruction in our documentation. It can be deploy through Vercel, Github, Firebase or any other hosting.

allFaq.title: What is your refund policy?
allFaq.description: We follow rules of Envato for the refund policy. If you don't love the template and if you create a refund request we will refund you within 24 hours.

allFaq.title: Can I use the template for learning React/NextJS & Tailwind CSS?
allFaq.description: Yes. The template and coding structure has been made very easy for our customers. If you're beginner label learner we think you will be able to understand everything. So you can choose the template for your learning undobetly.

allFaq.title: Is it comes with latest version of bootstrap?
allFaq.description: Yes. On template releasing time the bootstrap version is 5.0.2 and in the template used this version. We will add new version of bootstrap new release in all our new update.

allFaq.title: How to customize the template
allFaq.description: The customization process of the template is very easy. We used npm method for run the template so you don't need to use usual sass runner for customizing the template. Live server, Sass everything will automatically run with a single command.

faq.title: Have any Question?
faq.subtitle: Here are some frequently asked questions by our users.

allFaq.title: What is your refund policy?
allFaq.description: We fully stand behind our plugins and are committed to delivering quality. However, we understand that not every plugin will be a perfect fit for everyone. If you’re not satisfied with your purchase, encounter any issues, or if there’s a problem we can’t resolve, we’re happy to offer a full 100% refund within 14 days of your original purchase—no questions asked.

allFaq.title: Can I use a ThemeAtelier plugins on more than one site?
allFaq.description: When purchasing a ThemeAtelier plugin from CodeCanyon, the licensing terms are governed by CodeCanyon's standard licenses. According to these terms, each license permits the use of the plugin on a single end product, which typically translates to one website or domain. This means that to use the plugin on multiple sites, you would need to purchase separate licenses for each site. It's important to note that CodeCanyon does not offer a developer or multi-site license for themes and code items. Therefore, even with an Extended License, the usage is still limited to a single end product and does not extend to multiple sites.

allFaq.title: Can I customize the plugins?
allFaq.description: Our plugins are fully customizable, giving you complete control over the styling. Each plugin includes an easy-to-use settings panel, allowing you to adjust all features without needing to touch a single line of code.

allFaq.title: How often are plugins updated?
allFaq.description: Plugin updates depend on several factors. Security patches and critical bug fixes are prioritized and released as quickly as possible. Updates that enhance our plugin framework and introduce new features are provided regularly.

allFaq.title: Are the plugins translation-ready?
allFaq.description: Yes, ThemeAtelier plugins are fully translatable and have been tested with WPML, Polylang, Loco Translate, qTranslate-X, GTranslate, Google Language Translator, WPGlobus, and more.
